name: Bigboss Recent Post Widget
author: Bulbul bigboss

sections.description:
Bigboss Recent Post Widget for Showing Recent Post with thumbnail and title [Auto Exclude current post] in widget/sidebar area of your WordPress site with Exceptional setting option Thumbnails size/position, Thumbnails border, Title font size/color Display date author etc..
You can show any number of post, just put a number in the Bigboss Recent Post Widget setting section. If you want to show all post then set the value 0

If you face any problem then contact with us
bigboss Soft BD

Basic Use
Install the plugin and Go to Appearance-> widget ->Bigboss Recent Post Widget. Just Drug and Drop in your Sidebar area , Check the setting

Arbitrary section

To Know About us Check My Youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/bulbulbigbossbd
sections.installation:
How To install Bigboss Recent Post Widget plugin on your wordpress site
1.Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

2.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

3 Go to Appearance-> widget ->Bigboss Recent Post Widget.

4.Just Drug and Drop in your Sidebar area , Check the setting
sections.faq:
Does it conflict with other plugins?

No. I Used latest JS. It will not conflict with other plugins.

Does it have the setting option?

Yes. Check the setting in Widget area

How Many Post I can show?

You can show any number of post, just put a number in the Bigboss Recent Post Widget setting section. If you want to show all post then set the value 0
